TopicTitle: What features do you think should be worked on after 1.0

Articles.Content:
Maxmaps has asked us if we would like improvements in performance and bugfixes for existing features or more features for 1.0. Reading the comments on that thread, I think most of us agree that bugfixing and such is the most important aspect of 1.0, with some concerns for balance and what not. 

I also think that's important for 1.0, but the dev's willingness to ask us if we want more features makes me wonder what I would still want being added to the stock game after release. 

I have not included Unity 5 in the poll because mostly everyone want's that anyway. Maxmaps' comment makes me think the devs will get to that when they get to that.

**More planets should be counted as part of "game mechanics", so if that's what you want, vote 4.**

**Oh, and I forgot multiplayer... I guess, count that as 4 too.** 

(I think I made a spelling mistake in the poll. It should be "parts", not "part's", right? Forgive my poor English)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-17T16:16:59Z" title="03/17/2015 04:16  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 17, 2015</time> by Musil**

But...we don't know which features will make their way into 1.0. After reading Max's post i think devs are prepared to push back some things, and ask us what should it be. In my opinion this discussion is premature, until we get the confirmation what will be in 1.0, and what will be delayed to 1.1.

Hmmm... I think we know. They have said the improved atmosphere, fairings, mining and added relevance to the Kerbal XP system are already in. Maxmap's was asking if we wanted still MOAR things. 

This post is mainly to vent. I said in that thread the current plan for 1.0 was good, and my only concern is balance. But I still want to dream about my perfect stock KSP for 1.1 and beyond, so here we can do that.
I know its probably an engine problem, but multi-core processor support would be fantastic along with an overall smoother experience with graphics etc.

Out of your choices : "More part's that improve existing features"

 --> Electric Propellers / solar panel wings (or solar panel coating aka 'film' to coat surfaces with)

And you're right about Unity5. Mostly because that will benefit me tremendously.

Though I voted for visual enhancements for immediately post 1.0, I would love to see more experiments down the line. There is such a wealth of science to be done in space, and I want to be able to experiment more and more! Personally, I'd love to give space stations a bigger role in experiments, preferably done inside the crewed part, as opposed to stuck to the outside last-minute
Station/base/deep space parts

Has anyone ever said something about an original soundtrack for KSP? I mean the MacLeod stuff is good but i think its own memorable music could only benefit the game.

Oh the question is what to do AFTER v.1. 

Multiplayer

Planets improvements: more of them, more interesting surfaces, real atmospheres (variable temperature, pressure...etc. that influence flight and experiments), dangerous environments (volcanoes, rivers, rings/asteroid belts).

Some additional effects would also improve immersion a lot like the CollisionFX mod. Dust particles, weather, disassembly effects... a lot of things could be improved.
